description: '''Punta rock''', or '''Belizean punta''', is a form of [[Garifuna music]] originating in [[Belize]] and created by [[Pen Cayetano]]. Songs are usually sung in [[Belizean Creole|Belizean Kriol]] or [[Garifuna language|Garifuna]] and rarely in Spanish or English. Many [[Garifuna American]] artists and bands perform the genre as well.
